entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expander is destroyed when wrapped within Border with Shadow #25537
  • Application crash on setting icon on toolbar item #25534
  • A Grid in a ListView - Why won't it render properly in Android? #25533
  • sign in to apple give authentication service unavailable in visual studio 2022 #25531
  • [ci] New templates failing on signing #25525
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Issue/Question about Custom URL Scheme Activation on .NET MAUI (Android): System.InvalidOperationException #25524
  • [Windows] The screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage. #25518

Closed

  • Existing TextDecorations applied to a Label are not removed when a new TextDecoration value is set after the Label's Text has been modified #16967
    Backlog
  • First debug #25358
  • Maui programs on Windows and Android do not access sites and url #23011
  • App isn't responding #25519
  • iOS development blocked by "Service Unavailable" error #25520
  • Unable to customize scrollbar on ListView #25415
    Backlog
  • DatePicker Text hide while hovering in Windows #23843
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] Border + RefreshView will let ScrollView no SizeChanged #16711
  • RoundRectangle on Grid Column set to Auto... Slowly stretches the Grid column #21746
  • Cannot use SetModalPresentationStyle in MAUI project #25209
  • DisplayPromptAsync not working in iOS 17.4 #24368
  • Msui bug on startup #25234
  • [WIN] MAUI Not Returning and Sending Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Input.PreviewKeyDown Event When Subscribed. #23789
  • The text entered in the Entry is not visible when using Handlers with BaseInputConnection while the Predictive Text option is enabled in the keyboard settings on Samsung devices. #24926
  • In iphone 16 (ios 18) Splash screen showing black #25246
  • BindingContext is returning null #25210
  • About the maui problem with 2147942405 (0x800700005) #25308
  • Text Disappearing on Reducing Scale in .NET MAUI SfImageEditor #25249

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Update versions sdk/runtime #25535
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr10] Fix Button Regression with null image source #25528

Merged

  • [main] Merge release 9.0.1xx to main #25527
  • [iOS] Fix for TextDecorations not updating after modifying Label text #25339
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [gh actions] use "inclusive heat sensor" v0.1.1 #25532
  • [ci] Fix signing new templates #25526
  • Fix Button Regression with null image source #25485
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Testing] Changes in ported Xamarin.UITest tests #25522
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 9 GA #25509
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA

Updated

  • [iOS] Pasting long text when the editor has a max length #23877
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR1
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [iOS] Only invalidate ancestors upon MeasureInvalidated #25465
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu
  • [NO_MERGE] WIP: Testing iossim hangs #25467
    do-not-merge
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Windows] Improve AOT compatibility on Windows #25476
  • [Android] Fix incorrect height of CollectionView when ItemsSource is empty. #24067
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 9.0 GA
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
